settings.women_heading_p: Prescription products require an online review by a licensed provider. Restrictions apply. Hair Blends are compounded products that have not been approved by the FDA. The FDA does not verify the safety or effectiveness of compounded drugs.

settings.nature_p_content: Hair Blends combine dermatologist-recommended prescription ingredients with high-grade hair vitamins and supplements.

settings.women_care_content: of women will experience hair loss in their lifetime.*
settings.women_care_inner: *Desmond C.C. Gan, Rodney D. Sinclair, Prevalence of Male and Female Pattern Hair Loss in Maryborough, Journal of Investigative Dermatology Symposium Proceedings, Volume 10, Issue 3.

settings.testimonial_text: I have had issues with hair loss for 10 years. After using Hers for about 4 months, I was noticing some regrowth that I was really excited about!
I noticed my hair getting thicker in places that was thin and it had more body. I have my confidence back.
The difference was very clear and fast forward 6 months my hair looks amazing!
Been a huge joy for me. Within 5 months, I got my edge back and my hair and confidence is restored!
I began to see progress in less than 3 months. My brother saw my progress and has begun using it!
I've had thinning at the crown for many years. Now it's definitely filling in. I love that!

settings.heading-text2: Results that thousands of women are loving

settings.slider_title: More hair on your head, less in the drain
settings.slider_info: If you’ve had it with empty promises and empty bottles that had no results, you’ve come to the right place.

settings.slider_title: No more guessing, no more stressing
settings.slider_info: We keep things simple—our process is 100% online with no in-person visits or insurance required.

settings.slider_title: Look like yourself, feel like yourself
settings.slider_info: Losing your hair can feel like losing your identity, so we use ingredients proven to work.

settings.slider_title: Aging is a part of life, hair loss doesn’t have to be
settings.slider_info: Hormones, aging, and menopause can all be causes of hair loss—find a treatment that works for you.

settings.marquee_text: Helping people feel great throuth the  power of better health

settings.collection_des: Hair Blends are compounded products that have not been approved by the FDA. The FDA does not verify the safety or effectiveness of compounded drugs.

settings.title: Meet the experts
settings.info: The medical providers we work with are vetted, board-licensed, and ready to help. They operate in all 50 states and are available 24/7 to answer your questions and address your concerns.

settings.icon_text: Get your hair profile by telling us about your hair needs, routine, and goals for treatment.
Provide some information about your health history and a licensed medical professional will determine what’s right for you.
Your hair treatment ships to you for free, if prescribed.
Get unlimited, ongoing, totally online access to follow-ups, adjustments, and answers to your questions.
